Hey man great upload thank you! you made my day, i was at the race and i couldn't wait to the replay!
By the way, i think you ripped this from mx-life.tv ,  is the video quality good on this site? like can you watch the race and replay in 720p? cause i'm thinking of getting an account

Hi. Indeed this upload come from mx-life. What you see on these videos is the best quality you can have on the website. It's not 720p, more like 480p. Get the account, they have done a really good work all along the year and it's not expensive. And you can watch qualifying races, european championships...
Ok thanks for the answer. And keep up the great uploads!
